title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Embrace the enchanting flavors of autumn with The Republic of Tea's Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle! This delightful collection features two delectable herbal teas – Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple – each with 36 count tea bags.

The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a naturally caffeine-free blend that captures the essence of apple cider with the warming notes of cinnamon and cloves. This soothing brew combines apple pieces, orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, natural flavors, ginger root, cloves, and cardamom seeds to create a symphony of flavors that will make you reminisce about crisp fall days.

The Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free treat that marries the sweetness of apples, the richness of vanilla, and the smoothness of South African Rooibos. With a comforting base of rooibos, apple bits, natural apple and caramel flavors, and vanilla extract, this tea is the perfect indulgence without any guilt.

Both teas are easy to steep and make the perfect accompaniment to the harvest season or as a dessert tea. Simply use 6 oz of boiling water and steep for 5-7 minutes. As a bonus, used tea bags can be added to compost or soil, making these teas a sustainable choice.

Don't miss out on this limited-edition bundle and experience the magic of fall with every sip. Order your The Republic of Tea's Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle today!
